author: Special Correspondent - Vsp
text:
Amritanandamayi

to visit city

Mata Amritanandamayi will be visiting Coimbatore on February 13 and 14 for the Brahmasthanam Temple Mahotsavam at Mata Amritanandamayi Math, Nallampalayam. The two-day programme will include satsang, meditation and darshan starting 10 a.m. The programme will

also include Shani

Dosha Nivarana Puja at 7 a.m. on February 14 and Lalitha Sahashranama Archana. Contact: 0422-2535258 or 97917-85121.
title: Briefly – Page 2 or 3
